title: Leading deodorant brands ranked by sales value in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014
summary: The statistic illustrates the number of Sales brands ranked by in the Leading in 2014 , value Brand .
In 2014 , 98.0 million United Kingdom Sales owned a Male_Lynx ranked dryer .
As of 2014 , almost 80 million of United Kingdom Sales had a ranked dryer .
gold: This statistic shows the leading 3 brands of deodorant sold in the United Kingdom ( UK ) ranked by their total sales in the year to December 2014.
Male Lynx and female Sure deodorant brands ranked as the highest selling brands in the United Kingdom over that period , reaching 98 and 73.6 million British pounds in sales respectively .
